= Introduction =

The [http://beta.ausstage.edu.au/ Aus-e-Stage] project is a [https://www.pfc.org.au/bin/view/Main/NeAT NeAT funded] project that is working on developing services that extend the capabilities of the existing text-based search-and-retrieval [http://www.ausstage.edu.au AusStage] website.

[http://www.ausstage.edu.au AusStage]  fulfils a national need for public access to reliable information on the full spectrum of live performance in Australia, delivering a data set of national significance to research, post graduate students, policy makers in government and industry practitioners; there is no other comparable database in existence. 


= Services =

The services currently under development are:

 * [http://beta.ausstage.edu.au/mapping/ Mapping Events]
 * Navigating Networks
 * Researching Audiences

= Purpose of this Wiki =

The purpose of this Wiki is to manage documentation specifically related to the development activities that are building the above services. For example a list of [Articles How To Articles] on how to use the various tools developed as part of the project and to maintain a list of UsefulLinks for the developers working on the project.
